TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CounterSample extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 定义存放性能计数器的原始数据的结构。

span.span: Defines a structure that holds the raw data for a performance counter.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将类，以显示性能计数器数据。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to display data for a performance counter. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CS/averagecount32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/VB/averagecount32.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure.

MemberSignature.Usage: new System.Diagnostics.CounterSample (rawValue, baseValue, counterFrequency, systemFrequency, timeStamp, timeStamp100nSec, counterType)

param.name: rawValue
param.span: 与性能计数器样本关联的数值。

span.span: The numeric value associated with the performance counter sample.

param.name: baseValue
param.span: 可选的计数器基原始值，仅当该样本基于多个计数器时才使用。

span.span: An optional, base raw value for the counter, to use only if the sample is based on multiple counters.

param.name: counterFrequency
param.span: 读取计数器的频率。

span.span: The frequency with which the counter is read.

param.name: systemFrequency
param.span: 系统读取计数器的频率。

span.span: The frequency with which the system reads from the counter.

param.name: timeStamp
param.span: 原始时间戳。

span.span: The raw time stamp.

param.name: timeStamp100nSec
param.span: 原始的高保真时间戳。

span.span: The raw, high-fidelity time stamp.

param.name: counterType
param.span: 对象，它指示计数器的类型，此样本是该计数器的快照。

span.span: A object that indicates the type of the counter for which this sample is a snapshot.

summary.span: 初始化 结构的新实例，然后将 属性设置为 0（零）。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure and sets the property to 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数获取性能计数器的初始样本。Use this constructor to take an initial sample of the performance counter. 系统监视器提供这些参数的值自动在调用时方法的第一次。The System Monitor supplies values for these parameters automatically when you call the method for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数后已经完成了性能计数器的初始样本执行示例。Use this constructor to take samples after you have already taken an initial sample of the performance counter. 系统监视器提供这些参数的值自动在调用时方法。The System Monitor supplies values for these parameters automatically when you call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化新结构中的值将传递`rawValue`， `baseValue`， `counterFrequency`， `systemFrequency`， `timeStamp`， `timeStamp100nSec`， `counterType`，和`counterTimeStamp`参数。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a new structure, passing in values for the `rawValue`, `baseValue`, `counterFrequency`, `systemFrequency`, `timeStamp`, `timeStamp100nSec`, `counterType`, and `counterTimeStamp` parameters. 在创建后结构，该示例显示的属性值控制台窗口中。After creating the structure, the example displays the property values for the in the console window. span.span: The system time stamp, represented within 0.1 millisecond.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例显示的值计数器的属性。The following example displays the value of the property for a counter.
